properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT POST_NO, POST_TITLE, MEMBER_NIC, CREATE_DATE, READ_COUNT FROM CAMP_REVIEW C JOIN MEMBER M USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE $ LIKE ? AND M.STATUS = 'N' AND C.STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC, POST_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM CAMP_REVIEW WHERE STATUS = 'N'
UPDATE CAMP_REVIEW SET READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT + 1 WHERE POST_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'N'

SELECT C.POST_NO, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, MEMBER_NIC, CREATE_DATE, (SELECT PATH || NEW_NAME FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE POST_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'N') AS "TITLE_IMG" FROM CAMP_REVIEW C JOIN MEMBER M USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A on C.POST_NO = A.POST_NO WHERE C.POST_NO = ? AND M.STATUS = 'N' AND C.STATUS = 'N'
SELECT POST_NO, LISTAGG(TAG_NO,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY POST_NO) AS TAG_NO FROM REVIEW_TAG WHERE POST_NO=? GROUP BY POST_NO
SELECT PHOTO_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, NEW_NAME, PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE STATUS = 'N' AND BOARD_NO = 6 AND POST_NO = ?
INSERT INTO CAMP_REVIEW ( BOARD_NO, POST_NO, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( 6, ?, ?, ?, ? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT (PHOTO_NO, BOARD_NO, POST_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, NEW_NAME, PATH) VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, 6, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT (PHOTO_NO, BOARD_NO, POST_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, NEW_NAME, PATH) VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, 6, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE CAMP_REVIEW SET POST_TITLE = ?, POST_CONTENT = ? WHERE POST_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'N'
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ? , NEW_NAME = ? , PATH = ? , UPLOAD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_NO = 6 AND POST_NO = ?
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE BOARD_NO = 6 AND POST_NO = ?
UPDATE CAMP_REVIEW SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE POST_NO = ?
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE BOARD_NO = 6 AND POST_NO = ?
INSERT INTO REPLY(REPLY_NO,BOARD_NO ,REPLY_CONTENT, POST_NO, WRITER) VALUES(SEQ_PLYNO.NEXTVAL, 6, ?, ?, ?)

SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, MEMBER_NIC, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD HH:MI:SS')CREATE_DATE FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER ON (WRITER = MEMBER_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'N' AND BOARD_NO = 6 AND POST_NO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC , REPLY_NO DESC
